view.label: Lista de Presupuestos de una order de reparaci贸n
view.sqlSentence: SELECT CONCAT(offer.series,"/",offer.number), offer.issue_date, registry.document, CONCAT_WS(", ",registry.surname,registry.name) FROM tas_offer, offer, registry WHERE tas_offer.offer = offer.id AND tas_offer.support_order = ? AND offer.target = registry.id

parameter.label: C贸digo de orden de reparaci贸n
parameter.name: support_order
